announcements.title: Launcher v2.0.0 Released
body: This is a major update with several new features and improvements:
- Added a new analytics tab where users can view detailed statistics about the games devs released and a rankings section to see top performers.
- Added a new announcements section to keep users informed about the latest news and updates.
- You can view recent updates or installs in the downloads page.
- The dev pills in store page now works as a horizontal scroll, making it easier to browse through them.
- The UI has been revamped with better animations and a nicer look and feel overall.
